topic.title: The Coffee Cauldron
topic.shortdesc: This is my date idea for laid-back couples or those who want a late-night cozy atmosphere.

section.title: About
section.p: A cute spooky-themed café, The Coffee Cauldron is the newest coffee spot on the block. While it sells the classics – coffee, hot chocolate, and pastries – it stands out with its late-night hours! Plan on staying up late to get all your fun activities done while you're in town? The Coffee Cauldron's espresso will be sure to keep you up!

image.alt: A orange pumpkin sugar cookie and a purple bat sugar cookie.

section.title: Review
section.p: This café has saved me more times than I can count. I am a procrastinator at heart and work best at night but sometimes I get a little too sleepy to finish all my work in time, so I head on over for an oat milk latte pick-me-up.

section.title: Recommendation
section.p: Since The Coffee Cauldron is known to be a late-night destination, I recommend going as late as you possibly can. Order the fruity coffee flight or a white hot chocolate if you're not a caffeine fan. Have a relaxing conversation with your date and play some cozy video games at their complimentary gaming station.
